005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFieldDefinition;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagDefinition;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015/**
016 * Represents a set of constraints that target a given definition using a target
017 * Metapath expression.
018 */
019public interface ITargetedConstraints extends IValueConstrained {
020  /**
021   * Get information about the resource the constraints were sources from.
022   *
023   * @return the source information
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  ISource getSource();
027
028  /**
029   * Get the Metapath expression used to identify the target of the constraint.
030   *
031   * @return the uncompiled Metapath expression
032   */
033  @NonNull
034  String getTargetExpression();
035
036  /**
037   * Apply the constraint to the provided definition.
038   *
039   * @param definition
040   *          the definition to apply the constraint to
041   */
042  void target(@NonNull IFlagDefinition definition);
043
044  /**
045   * Apply the constraint to the provided definition.
046   *
047   * @param definition
048   *          the definition to apply the constraint to
049   */
050  void target(@NonNull IFieldDefinition definition);
051
052  /**
053   * Apply the constraint to the provided definition.
054   *
055   * @param definition
056   *          the definition to apply the constraint to
057   */
058  void target(@NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition);
059}
